summary:
Adds four new spells-
-Acid Spray
-Slime Spray
-Bolt Of Apocrypha
-Maw of Apocrypha
descriptionHtml:
Adds four new spells-
-Acid Spray is a spell that spits acid at your opponent depleting their heath and stamina.

-Slime Spray is a spell that fires black sludge and tentacles at your opponent and will hurt them if they step in it also leaves behind an electrical effect.

-Bolt Of Apocrypha shoots a bolt of green energy that will deplete your opponents health, magicka, and stamina.

-Maw of Apocrypha shoots a wave of green energy that will make your opponent stagger and damage their health and magicka.

These spells can be seen being used by seekers and lurkers.

You can buy them from Neloth in Tel Mithryn
-REQUIRES DRAGONBORN
author: DemonLord7654
